name: Dawn
description: Please, you must rethink this, this.. 'Dawn Core' failure we've recovered from Nian's work. I don't know what memo you've read that's got you sold on this, but listen to me - what you think it MIGHT do, it WILL do so much WORSE!
author: Recovered comms, Dr. Miriam Kawn (with 86% certainty)
icon: data/strings/com/fs/starfarer/api/impl/campaign/you can hear it cant you/our whispers through the void/our song/graphics/icons/skills/dawn_boss_core_skill.png

name: Dusk
description: Integrating a human with Project Dusk was a stroke of genius. The human mind stabilizes the AI in phase space. It's not insanity; it's evolution.
author: Project Lead Dr. Octavia Yang, in a Tri-Tachyon strategy meeting
icon: data/strings/com/fs/starfarer/api/impl/campaign/you can hear it cant you/our whispers through the void/our song/graphics/icons/skills/dusk_boss_core_skill.png

name: Elysia
description: I'm all for pushing boundaries against rampant misused of Tri-tachyon AI - but fighting fire with fire using the so-called 'Celestial Prison' just seems to me to be making things worse.
author: Major General Elias Rhodes, classified communication
icon: data/strings/com/fs/starfarer/api/impl/campaign/you can hear it cant you/our whispers through the void/our song/graphics/icons/skills/elysia_boss_core_skill.png
